data.title: Will There Be a Judge Dee’s Mystery Season 2 Release Date & Is It Coming Out?
data.meta_description: Based on a series of novels and stories by Dutch author Robert van Gulik, Judge Dee’s Mystery is a Chinese period mystery drama series. The plot revolves around Di Renjie, a gifted investigator, as he solves complex cases in the Tang Dynasty. Van Gulik drew inspiration for his work from Di Gong An, an 18th-century […] The post Will There Be a Judge Dee’s Mystery Season 2 Release Date & Is It Coming Out? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
data.text:
Based on a series of novels and stories by Dutch author Robert van Gulik, Judge Dee’s Mystery is a Chinese period mystery drama series. The plot revolves around Di Renjie, a gifted investigator, as he solves complex cases in the Tang Dynasty. Van Gulik drew inspiration for his work from Di Gong An, an 18th-century Chinese novel by an anonymous author. In that novel and those by Van Gulik, Di Renjie is modeled after the namesake historical county magistrate and statesman from seventh-century China.

Season 1 originally premiered in China on February 6, 2024. Wondering whether there will be a Judge Dee’s Mystery Season 2? This is what we have learned.

Here’s all the Judge Dee’s Mystery Season 2 release date information we know so far, and all the details on when it is coming out.

Is there a Judge Dee’s Mystery Season 2 release date?

Judge Dee’s Mystery Season 2 does not have an official release date, but it will likely be announced in the future.

As of March 2024, there is no official announcement about the sophomore season of Judge Dee’s Mystery. East Asian series don’t often last more than one season. However, Judge Dee’s Mystery can potentially be one of the exceptions. Van Gulik published an impressive number of novels and short stories revolving around Di Renjie. If the reaction of the international audience is positive after watching the series on Netflix, season 2 can potentially happen.

The cast of Judge Dee’s Mystery includes Zhou Yiwei as Di Renjie, and Wang Likun as Cao An. Ta Ji as Qiao Tai, Zhong Chuxi as Empress Wu and Ling Zi as Ma Rong are also part of the cast.

Where is Judge Dee’s Mystery Season 2 coming out?

Judge Dee’s Mystery Season 2 could come out in China on Youku and on Netflix in the US and certain other regions of the world.

This is because the first season of the Mandarin-language series premiered on the same platforms.

ComingSoon will provide an update if and when there is an official update about Judge Dee’s Mystery Season 2.

The official synopsis for Judge Dee’s Mystery reads:

“Due to government shuffle during the reign of Wu Zetian, the ambitious Di Renjie was relegated to a remote town in the east. Di showed extraordinary talent in case-solving, but as he probed further, more and more secrets were revealed. He embarked on a nationwide journey and solved many mysterious cases. In the end, he returned to Chang’an and reunited with his father. Together, they tackled a crisis that threatened peace and order.”
